WorkItem.Description: The SelectorRegionAdapter (or the SelectorItemsSourceSyncBehavior) ignores the ViewSortHint attribute. To reproduce, add views with the ViewSortHint attributes to a ListBox region.
WorkItem.Summary: ViewSortHint is ignored when region is attached to ListBox

Comments.Message: We've confirmed this bug and will have a fix for the next drop.
